channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.8.14
item.description:
v1.8.14

Hotfix

  • Improved Ollama Integration: Fixed an issue where the app wouldn’t immediately detect a running Ollama server or available models on launch. The connection status and model list should now update automatically without requiring a manual refresh. NameQuick will also now intelligently select an available Ollama model if your previously selected one isn’t found.
